column4: Q: i am trying to install ubuntu 7 from DVD on a computer where I have windows 7. On ubuntu.com it says there should appear Install ubunto alongside windows 7, however that option does not appear. When I go to Something else only one partition appears (having as size the total amount of space on the harddrive), however when I browse from CD on Ubuntu all partitions appear. What's wrong and how can I fixt this?
i would say that s  a bug , try to retart the pc and go at it again,
thx. i will try that and see if it is a bug
i know its out there cuz i seen it , but  i forgot to install the fix for it,
